summary: ON MONDAY MAY 12 I WAS INVOLVED IN A CAR ACCIDENT.  I AM CONCERNED BECAUSE MY AIR BAD DID NOT ACTIVATE.  I WAS DRIVING A 2001 FORD F250, GOING AROUND 40-45 MILES PER HOUR.  I RAN INTO THE BACK OF A PERSON THAT WAS SITTING STOPPED AT A RED LIGHT.  I NEVER HIT MY BRAKES SO I HIT HER STRAIGHT IN THE REAR.  WHY TYPE OF IMPACT DOES IT TAKE FOR THE SENSOR TO GO OFF FOR AIR BAGS?   *NLM
